description.value: Collect metrics form an ElasticSearch Server

property.label: ElasticSearch Server URL
property.description: Enter the URL to an ElasticSearch Cluster Node. {host} will be replaced with target host. Example: 'http://{host}:9200/'.

property.label: Custsomize HTTP client
property.description: Configure HTTP client settings

property.label: Disable certificate validation
property.description: Enable to allow connections via SSL even if the certificate on the target host is invalid or self-signed.

property.label: User-Agent
property.description: The user agent string identifies the HTTP client and is sent with every request.

property.label: Server authorization
property.description: If the URL specified requires a name and password for access, server authorization needs to be enabled.

property.label: Server username
property.description: The username that is used for authorization with the server.

property.label: Server password
property.description: The password for the username.

property.label: Max. redirects
property.description: If a value of 1 or greater is specified, the URL Monitor will follow HTTP redirect codes (301-303, 307) to retrieve the webpage.

property.label: Use custom timeout
property.description: If enabled allows configuration of HTTP timeout.

property.label: Socket Timeout
property.description: The default socket timeout in milliseconds which is the timeout for waiting for data. A timeout value of zero is interpreted as an infinite timeout.

property.label: Connection Timeout
property.description: The timeout until a connection is established. A value of zero means the timeout is not used.

property.label: Connection RequestTimeout
property.description: The timeout until a connection request is received. A value of zero means the timeout is not used.

property.label: Use proxy
property.description: If enabled, the configured HTTP proxy server will be used to access the URL.

property.label: Proxy host
property.description: The hostname of the HTTP proxy server.

property.label: Proxy port
property.description: The port of the HTTP proxy server.

property.label: Proxy authorization
property.description: If the HTTP proxy server requires a username and a password for access, proxy authorization needs to be enabled.

property.label: Proxy username
property.description: The username that is used for authorization with the HTTP proxy server.

property.label: Proxy password
property.description: The password for the proxy username.

property.label: Force Virtual Host
property.description: Force an HTTP Host: header. Use this in special cases (e.g. a load-balancer) when servername is not the virtual host configured in the WebServer

property.label: Virtual Host
property.description: Virtual host

property.label: DynaTrace Tagging
property.description: Enable dynaTrace tagging.

property.label: Timer name
property.description: Identify this webrequest through a unique timer name. The timer name will be sent with each web request as a dynaTrace header field value.

metric.name: ConnectionTimedOut
metric.description: 1 if connection timed out

metric.name: ContentVerified
metric.description: 1 if result is validated and valid

metric.name: HostReachable
metric.description: 1 if host is reachable

metric.name: Response Time
metric.description: Complete response time (e.g. connection + query + read)

metric.name: Result
metric.description: Server Response (e.g. query data)

metric.name: ServerLatency
metric.description: Server latency

metric.name: SocketTimedOut
metric.description: 1 if socket had timed out

metric.name: Status
metric.description: Response status (0 OK)

metric.name: ActivePrimaryShards
metric.description: The number of primary shards that are used across the cluster

metric.name: ActiveShards
metric.description: The number of shards (primary and replica) that are used across the cluster

metric.name: ActiveShardsPercent
metric.description: Percentage of shards that are active, a green cluster should have 100% here

metric.name: CompletionSize
metric.description: Size of completion caches

metric.name: DataNodeCount
metric.description: Number of active data nodes

metric.name: DelayedUnassignedShards
metric.description: The number of shards that are in delayed state

metric.name: DeleteCurrent
metric.description: Currently active delete operations per node

metric.name: DeletedCount
metric.description: Number of deleted documents

metric.name: DeletedCountPerSecond
metric.description: Derived measure which provides the number of documents deleted per second since the monitor was last run

metric.name: DocCount
metric.description: Number of documents

metric.name: DocCountPerSecond
metric.description: Derived measure which provides the number of documents added per second since the monitor was last run

metric.name: FetchCurrent
metric.description: Currently active fetch operations per node

metric.name: FieldDataEvictions
metric.description: How often field data was evicted from the field data cache

metric.name: FieldDataSize
metric.description: Size of the field data per node

metric.name: FileDescriptorCount
metric.description: Allowed number of max file descriptor on the operating system split by node

metric.name: FileDescriptorLimit
metric.description: File descriptor metrics split by different file descriptor measures

metric.name: FileSystemSize
metric.description: File system metrics split by different file system measures

metric.name: IndexCount
metric.description: The count of indexes

metric.name: IndexingCurrent
metric.description: Currently active indexing operations per node

metric.name: IndexingThrottleTime
metric.description: Time that indexing was throttled per node

metric.name: InitHeap
metric.description: The number of bytes currently initialized on the heap per node

metric.name: InitNonHeap
metric.description: The number of bytes currently initialized off-heap per node

metric.name: InitializingShards
metric.description: The number of shards that are currently initializing

metric.name: MaxDirect
metric.description: The number of bytes of direct memory that can be used per node

metric.name: MaxHeap
metric.description: The number of bytes of heap-memory that can be used at max per node

metric.name: MaxNonHeap
metric.description: The number of bytes of off-heap memory that can be used at max per node

metric.name: NodeCount
metric.description: Number of active nodes

metric.name: PercolateCount
metric.description: Percolate metrics split by different percolate measures

metric.name: PercolateSize
metric.description: Size used for percolation per node

metric.name: QueryCacheSize
metric.description: Size of the query cache per node

metric.name: QueryCurrent
metric.description: Currently active query operations per node

metric.name: RecoveryAsSource
metric.description: Number of shards that are recovered from this node

metric.name: RecoveryAsTarget
metric.description: Number of shards that are recovered to this node

metric.name: RecoveryThrottleTime
metric.description: Time that recovery was throttled per node

metric.name: RelocatingShards
metric.description: The number of shards that are currently relocated

metric.name: RequestCacheSize
metric.description: Size of the request cache

metric.name: ScrollCurrent
metric.description: Currently active scroll operations per node

metric.name: SegmentCount
metric.description: Number of segments

metric.name: SegmentSize
metric.description: Size of segments, split by different segment-measures

metric.name: ShardCount
metric.description: The number of shards with dynamic splittings by state

metric.name: StoreSize
metric.description: Size of storage overall per node

metric.name: StoreThrottleTime
metric.description: Time that storing was throttled per node

metric.name: TranslogSize
metric.description: Size of the translog per node

metric.name: UnassignedShards
metric.description: The number of shards that are currently uninitialized
